title: Was there ever a video game that nobody ever beat? - Quora

response.answer_text: Not counting endless games (like the Chrome dinosaur game) and actually unbeatable games (like Hexapawn with perfect AI), and allowing tool assistance (which is the only way Item Abuse 3 could be beaten), well, we can look to recent games I suppose. For instance, ChainChompBraden still hasn’t finished uploading Trials of Death in Super Mario Maker, even now after several hundreds of days (in elapsed play time) of attempts…

Sure  If you don't know what this is, that's SimCity. SimCity is not a game to be “won". There is no end goal, no boss, no ending. Your goal is to keep the city functional, in theory until the end of time. Most people build a city up to the point where it's the best it can possibly be, and then stop and build a new one in a different way. But you don't have to stop. You could just keep going forever.

The NTSC version of Impossible Mission for the Atari 7800 unwittingly lives up to its name: sometimes items you need spawn under computer terminals, but there is no way to search them, so you cannot progress. Thus, there is no way to beat it. The MS-DOS version of Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles also notoriously requires the player to jump over a gap that cannot be jumped over, making the game impossible to complete:

Mega Man 9. A game originally designed in Japan, Mega Man 9 was released by Capcom in 2008. The game hasn’t been beaten, at least by anyone I know of, and trust me that’s a lot of people. Being a videogame fanatic, I gave MM1 a try, and I SUCKED at it. MM9 is the 9th installment of what me and several others believe to be as the most difficult and challenging video game franchise.

EVERY GAME on this planet EVER INVENTED has been bested at least once. Sure there are some EXTREMELY HARD video games such as Super Meat Boy, Worlds Hardest Game (yes, this is the video game name), Unfair Mario, Trap Adventure 2, Cat Mario, Dark Souls 3 and may other games with their latest Difficulty level (Doom, Shadow of Tomb Raider, Dishonored etc etc). But ALL OF THESE and many more have been bested by hardcore players. There is NO IMPOSSIBLE To beat game at this moment :)
geometry dash. it just can’t be beat because every 10 seconds some levels are made and therefore it’s impossible to beat
